segments.text: Welcome to Credit Services . How can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello . I'm here to talk about my credit card . You see , I'm a corporate card holder and a personal card holder . I've had my personal credit card for ages , but my corporate one is new to me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right . Well , the benefits are a little different . With our Corporate Card you can use it for agency collection and payment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There's quite a long list , actually ! You can use if for business trip expenses , medical expenses , any internal payments .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And I suppose I can do that anywhere ? I do have to travel a lot for my job and it's such a hassle using cash and collecting all the separate receipts .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you put it on your card , you can get an overall statement that lists all of the transactions .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In just one document ? That will definitely be a time saver .
segments.speaker: S2
